Yes No Bio platinum gold silver bronze No Tweets This talk has been added to your schedule This talk has been removed from the schedule This speaker\'s talk has been removed from the schedule This speaker\'s talk has been added to the schedule Women Techmakers is a program created by Google to celebrate International Women\'s Day and to highlight the talent of women in technology. In 2018, we\'re organizing the third edition in Montreal as part of the special event \"The Women Techmakers Global Event Series Celebrating International Women\’s Day\" (WTM IWD). This program has been in over 200 global events and seen across 52 countries. The main focus of this community-building initiative is to promote talented and passionate women, increase the visibility of the Montreal technology community and honour women in technology.
